verses.verse: The wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and the desert <S%H6723><s%> will be glad, <S%H1523><s%> And the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> will rejoice <S%H1523><s%> and blossom; <S%H6524><s%> Like the crocus <S%H2261><s%>

It will blossom <S%H6524><s%> profusely <S%H6524><s%> And rejoice <S%H1523><s%> with rejoicing <S%H1525><s%> and shout <S%H7442><s%> of joy. <S%H7442><s%> The glory <S%H9202><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> will be given <S%H5414><s%> to it, The majesty <S%H1926><s%> of Carmel <S%H3760><s%> and Sharon. <S%H8289><s%> They will see <S%H7200><s%> the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> The majesty <S%H1926><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%>
Encourage <S%H2388><s%> the exhausted, <S%H3027><s%> <S%H7504><s%> and strengthen <S%H553><s%> the feeble. <S%H3782><s%> <S%H1290><s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> to those with anxious <S%H4116><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> "Take <S%H2388><s%> courage, <S%H2388><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> not. Behold, <S%H2009><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> [with] vengeance; <S%H5359><s%> The recompense <S%H1576><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> will come, <S%H935><s%> But He will save <S%H3467><s%> you."
Then <S%H227><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the blind <S%H5787><s%> will be opened, <S%H6491><s%> And the ears <S%H241><s%> of the deaf <S%H2795><s%> will be unstopped. <S%H6605><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> the lame <S%H6455><s%> will leap <S%H1801><s%> like a deer, <S%H354><s%> And the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the dumb <S%H483><s%> will shout <S%H7442><s%> for joy. <S%H7442><s%> For waters <S%H4325><s%> will break <S%H1234><s%> forth <S%H1234><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> And streams <S%H5158><s%> in the Arabah. <S%H6160><s%>

And the scorched <S%H8273><s%> land <S%H8273><s%> will become <S%H1961><s%> a pool, <S%H98><s%> And the thirsty <S%H6774><s%> ground <S%H6774><s%> springs <S%H4002><s%> of water; <S%H4325><s%> In the haunt <S%H5116><s%> of jackals, <S%H8565><s%> its resting <S%H7258><s%> place, <S%H7258><s%> Grass <S%H2682><s%> [becomes] reeds <S%H7070><s%> and rushes. <S%H1573><s%>

And a highway <S%H4547><s%> will be there, <S%H8033><s%> a roadway, <S%H1870><s%> And it will be called <S%H7121><s%> the Highway <S%H1870><s%> of Holiness. <S%H6944><s%> The unclean <S%H2931><s%> will not travel <S%H5674><s%> on it, But it [will] be for him who walks <S%H1980><s%> [that] way, <S%H1870><s%> And fools <S%H191><s%> will not wander <S%H8582><s%> [on it].

No <S%H3808><s%> lion <S%H9030><s%> will be there, <S%H8033><s%> Nor <S%H1077><s%> will any vicious <S%H6530><s%> beast <S%H9130><s%> go <S%H5927><s%> up on it; These will not be found <S%H4672><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%> But the redeemed <S%H1350><s%> will walk <S%H1980><s%> [there],

And the ransomed <S%H6299><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will return, <S%H7725><s%> And come <S%H935><s%> with joyful <S%H7440><s%> shouting <S%H7440><s%> to Zion, <S%H6726><s%> With everlasting <S%H5769><s%> joy <S%H8057><s%> upon their heads. <S%H7218><s%> They will find <S%H5381><s%> gladness <S%H8342><s%> and joy, <S%H8057><s%> And sorrow <S%H3015><s%> and sighing <S%H585><s%> will flee <S%H5127><s%> away. <S%H5127><s%>
